digest_items.title: Disable directory listing
digest_items.why: Directory listing exposes file structure and sensitive files
digest_items.fix: Set 'Options -Indexes' in Apache or 'autoindex off' in nginx

digest_items.title: Enable database encryption at rest
digest_items.why: Unencrypted databases are vulnerable if storage media is compromised
digest_items.fix: Enable Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) or equivalent for your database

digest_items.title: Rotate API keys quarterly
digest_items.why: Regular rotation limits the window of exposure if keys are compromised
digest_items.fix: Set calendar reminders and use secret management tools like HashiCorp Vault

digest_items.title: Implement session timeout
digest_items.why: Long-lived sessions increase risk of session hijacking
digest_items.fix: Set session timeout to 15-30 minutes for sensitive applications

digest_items.title: Implement network segmentation
digest_items.why: Segmentation limits lateral movement in case of breach
digest_items.fix: Separate production, staging, and development networks with firewalls

digest_items.title: Use parameterized queries
digest_items.why: Parameterized queries prevent SQL injection attacks
digest_items.fix: Never concatenate user input into SQL; use prepared statements instead

digest_items.title: Use security headers scanner
digest_items.why: Missing security headers leave applications vulnerable to common attacks
digest_items.fix: Use securityheaders.com to scan and implement recommended headers
